name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TLDR Learning Languages on Every website

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TLDR Learning Languages on Every website
short.ko: React, Typescript, Vite를 사용한 크롬 익스텐션 보일러플레이트입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly understand web content in your preferred language! This extension summarizes each webpage in English, Dutch, French, German, and Spanish, offering simplified versions at three levels (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced). Plus, discover a curated list of vocabulary words to boost your language skills as you read. Perfect for language learners and anyone seeking quick, clear insights from complex articles.

This extension makes reading and learning from online content simple, accessible, and educational!

Update:
- Added sidebar for easier navigation and content access.
- Enhanced performance for faster page summarization and vocabulary loading.
- New vocabulary-saving feature 
- One button away to learn language


Upcoming:
- Review the words soon! Don't forget to bookmark
